data.title: Tears for Fears--Songs from the Big Chair 5.1 question: Live songs on "original/2014" mixes?
data.meta_description:
Hi all--

I recently got the box set, with 2 blu rays.  The 5.1/2014 stereo mix show, on my screen, that the song "Head Over Heels" is combined with a...
data.text:
Hi all--

I recently got the box set, with 2 blu rays. The 5.1/2014 stereo mix show, on my screen, that the song "Head Over Heels" is combined with a live version of "Broken": "Head Over Heels/Broken (Live)"

Is this the "studio" head over heels??

Yet, the box and label of the disc shows no such combination. So, really confused as to what is happening here.

Any info?

The original LP always had the studio "Head Over Heels" segue into the live "Broken", which is basically a reprise. The entire sequence is "Broken / Head Over Heels / Broken [Live]". I checked all the CDs that I have and the studio "Broken" is track 6 with "Head Over Heels / Broken [Live]" as track 7.

A remix of the entire piece was used on the 12" single as the "Preacher Mix."

The live recording of "Broken" is from the Hammersmith Odeon, December 1983. I wonder if the entire show exists.

Right. The Canadian I posted above I think is the only title on disc that actually indexes it. Making it a 9 tracker.

Thanks, very helpful!!!! I never had this record before and this really clarifies it. I appreciate it!
